name: Heck & Slash
description:
It's festival season again - time to get to work

Most of the time these festivals are a pleasant affair, friendly faces, great music and even better food. There's a reason they attract visitors from all over the country and sometimes beyond. That being said, sometimes more, shall we say, otherworldly visitors prove to be a little disruptive. That's where you come in... 

Heck & Slash is a 3D arcade-like action game in which players assume the role of a hired swordsman tasked with keeping pesky yokai from disrupting a nearby festival. Line up as many as possible in a single slash for the most points and try to survive as long as you can against the ever-increasing waves of yokai.

*Please keep in mind that this is only a prototype made as part of a class & may be worked on more in the future. Controls -

Move Camera - Mouse

Enable Slicing Mode - Space

Exit Slicing Mode/Perform Slice - Left Mouse Button

Exit Game - Esc
